spec_data.Name: perl-ExtUtils-AutoInstall
spec_data.Description:
ExtUtils::AutoInstall lets module writers specify a more sophisticated
form of dependency information than the PREREQ_PM option offered by
ExtUtils::MakeMaker.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:23:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Automatic install of dependencies via CPAN
